attributes.action: Celebrate St Georges Day with National Pride & Holiday n England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Yes its true in London funds are handed over to promote St Patricks day ( & many other ethnic events )however St Georges day slips by unrecognised? We want promotion, proportional funding,to celebrate with days holiday. We do not have English parlament yet our UK neighbours do? Surely we can celebrate our heritage and pride one day per year? If you agree, please take time to sign petition and forward to as many of your neglected English friends & family, thank you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
